class zim.export.exporters.files.MultiFileExporter(layout, template, format, index_page=None, document_root_url=None)¶

Bases: zim.export.exporters.files.FilesExporterBase

Exporter that exports each page to a single file

export_index(index_page, pages)¶
export_iter(pages)¶

Export pages while yielding page objects that are exported for progress monitoring

Also note that implementations must be robust to ignore errors when exporting pages.

Parameters

pages – a PageSelection object

Implementation

must be implemented by subclasses

class zim.export.exporters.mhtml.MHTMLExporter(file, template, document_root_url=None)¶

Bases: zim.export.exporters.Exporter

Exporter that exports pages and attachments to a single MHTML file.

export_iter(pages)¶

Export pages while yielding page objects that are exported for progress monitoring

Also note that implementations must be robust to ignore errors when exporting pages.

Parameters

pages – a PageSelection object

Implementation

must be implemented by subclasses

Module contents¶

The exporters are the main public objects for exporting, they control the execution of the whole process. Each exporter implements a different export style.

class zim.export.exporters.Exporter¶

Bases: object

Base class that defines the public API for exporter objects

export(pages)¶

Export pages

Parameters

pages – a PageSelection object

export_iter(pages)¶

Export pages while yielding page objects that are exported for progress monitoring

Also note that implementations must be robust to ignore errors when exporting pages.

Parameters

pages – a PageSelection object

Implementation

must be implemented by subclasses
